## FoundationLayout.autoSaveKey property

If set, this attribute auto saves and loads the layout as the user changes it. To disable this feature, omit this attribute. 

The attribute is set using `auto-save-key`.

**Signature:**

```typescript
autoSaveKey?: string;
```
